actions.text: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Roberts. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 461.

official_title: An original bill to reauthorize the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, to ensure protections of futures customers, to provide relief for farmers, ranchers, and end-users that manage risk to help keep consumer costs low, and for other purposes.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text:
Commodity End-User Relief Act

This bill amends the Commodity Exchange Act to reauthorize it and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) through FY2019, and revise requirements and prohibitions regarding:

 registered futures associations; futures commission merchants; commodity brokers in bankruptcy; futures trading transactions; judicial review of CFTC rules; the public interest exemption from futures trading and foreign transactions regulations of certain agreements, contracts, or transactions entered into pursuant to an approved or permitted tariff or rate schedule; swap dealers; unregistered designated contract markets or a swap execution facilities; bona fide hedging transactions or positions; and commodity pool operators that are qualified charitable organizations.

titles.title: An original bill to reauthorize the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, to ensure protections of futures customers, to provide relief for farmers, ranchers, and end-users that manage risk to help keep consumer costs low, and for other purposes.
